cleaned_text: 07 Jul [ICMRA statement on the safety of COVID-19 vaccines](https://www.sahpra.org.za/news-and-updates/icmra-statement-on-the-safety-of-covid-19-vaccines/) [News & Updates](https://www.sahpra.org.za/category/news-and-updates/) The South Africa Health Products Regulatory Authority (SAHPRA), in collaboration with Pharmacometrics Africa and tThe Department of Pharmacy and Pharmacology at the University of Witwatersrand, is pleased to announce the second cohort of graduates who successfully completed the short course for Clinical Assessors within African...
